channel.title: 法新社
channel.description: 这是一个追踪法新社news的种子

item.title: 一家领先的 VPN 提供商告诉法新社，在本周的一次最高级别政治会议期间，中国加大了封杀可使互联网用户访问被禁网站的软件的力度。
item.description:
China has intensified efforts to block software that enables internet users to access banned websites during a top political meeting this week, a leading VPN provider tells AFPhttps://t.co/fZNzjUxXPk pic.twitter.com/EPI8FMdvFF

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 10, 2024

item.title: 雷宾-皮什蒂万（Rebin Pishtiwan）蜷缩在一辆面包车的后座上，仔细地扫描着一页又一页泛黄的纸张，这是他将濒临消失的库尔德历史书籍数字化的任务之一。
item.description:
Huddled in the back of a van, Rebin Pishtiwan carefully scans one yellowed page after another, as part of his mission to digitise historic Kurdish books at risk of disappearinghttps://t.co/nsVZsFeQcz pic.twitter.com/RvuyCot8yg

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 10, 2024

item.title: 卢旺达执政党挑选保罗-卡加梅总统作为其 7 月大选的候选人，为这场普遍预计将使这位长期执政的领导人第四次连任 7 年的竞选做好了准备。
item.description:
Rwanda's ruling party picked President Paul Kagame as its candidate for the July election, teeing up a contest widely expected to return the longtime leader to office for a fourth seven-year term.https://t.co/yZcjTZWdli pic.twitter.com/mGnk14U9mA

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 10, 2024

item.title: 塞内加尔 3 月 24 日总统大选的竞选活动于周六正式开始，此前数周因大选推迟而出现动荡，其中一位主要竞选人与选民见面。
item.description:
Campaigning got underway Saturday for Senegal's March 24 presidential election, after weeks of turmoil caused by its delay, as one of the leading contenders met voters.https://t.co/xNPraVLrrF pic.twitter.com/FR87BKMBGi

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 10, 2024

item.title: 在远离暴力肆虐的海地，与多米尼加共和国交界处的一个市场仍能保持令人欣慰的正常日常生活。
item.description:
Far from the violence ravaging Haiti, a market on the border with the Dominican Republic has managed to maintain a welcome degree of normal everyday life.https://t.co/mCfkVR6gcw pic.twitter.com/7FW0pEJkaQ

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 10, 2024

item.title: 数千名以色列示威者聚集在特拉维夫，高喊 "现在就选举！"和 "现在就带回人质！"，要求本雅明-内塔尼亚胡总理在加沙战争五个月后下台。
item.description:
Shouting "Elections now!" and "Bring back the hostages now!", thousands of Israeli demonstrators gathered in Tel Aviv to demand the departure of Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu after five months of war in Gaza.https://t.co/LN4xDcBrcK pic.twitter.com/AnPstG5DZe

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 9, 2024

item.title: 海地首都的居民们正在查看最近爆发的帮派暴力事件所造成的破坏，武装组织放火焚烧了总统府并袭击了警察总部。
item.description:
Residents of Haiti's capital surveyed the damage caused by the latest explosion of gang violence, which saw armed groups set fire to the presidential palace and attack the police headquarters.https://t.co/JAlu3Z0WcB pic.twitter.com/ORwChJ29jn

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 9, 2024

item.title: 以色列说，以色列间谍头目与美国间谍头目进行了会晤，这是争取释放仍被扣押在加沙的人质的努力的一部分。
item.description:
Israel said its spy chief had met with his US counterpart as part of efforts to secure the release of hostages still held in Gaza.https://t.co/PBTZ6f6fm2

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 9, 2024

item.title: 一个统治卡拉奇长达三十多年的阴暗政党在巴基斯坦污点重重的大选中灰飞烟灭，该党曾监督卡拉奇沦为有组织犯罪的沼泽地。
item.description:
A shadowy political party that ruled Karachi for more than three decades, overseeing the city's descent into a swamp of organised crime, has risen from the ashes in Pakistan's tainted elections.https://t.co/RXzrel7sIq pic.twitter.com/HXo2ZnlKG7

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 9, 2024

item.title: 法国总统埃马纽埃尔-马克龙的盟友在中间派联盟发起欧洲议会选举竞选活动时，试图将该国的极右翼势力说成是克里姆林宫的同伙。
item.description:
Allies of French President Emmanuel Macron sought to cast the country's far-right forces as bedfellows of the Kremlin as the centrist alliance launched its campaign for European Parliament elections.https://t.co/taDTRpvQFF pic.twitter.com/7taB8MTAvT

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 9, 2024

item.title: 在乔-拜登发表了充满斗志的国情咨文几天后，他和竞争对手唐纳德-特朗普在同一块土地上开展竞选活动：2020 年拜登以不到 12,000 票的优势赢得的战场州佐治亚州。
item.description:
Days after Joe Biden delivered a combative State of the Union message, he and rival Donald Trump were campaigning on the same turf: the battleground state of Georgia, carried by Biden in 2020 by fewer than 12,000 votes.https://t.co/TpDOCfSp0B pic.twitter.com/hISa7JPV8C

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 9, 2024

item.title: 作为西班牙最著名的弗拉门戈舞王朝之一的继承人，舞蹈家法鲁基多将狂野的脚步与切分音节拍和活力完美结合--将这种艺术形式的 "生活方式 "带给全球观众。
item.description:
As heir to one of Spain's most renowned flamenco dynasties, dancer Farruquito pairs furious footwork with strumming syncopated beats and verve -- bringing the art form's "way of life" to global audiences.https://t.co/bhCg8cyrAh pic.twitter.com/kQwMmmHtWs

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 9, 2024

item.title: 科索沃部分地区的塞族社区正在努力获取第纳尔，这危及到当地数千人从贝尔格莱德领取的工资、养老金和社会保障金。
item.description:
Serb communities in parts of Kosovo are struggling to get their hands on dinars, jeopardising the salaries, pensions and social security payments that thousands there get from Belgrade.https://t.co/PDgUJ2Cbfm pic.twitter.com/w3wlLVteas

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 9, 2024

item.title: 2012 年，叶格巴尔-阿亚柳（Yegebal Ayalew）带着儿子从埃塞俄比亚移民到以色列，她看着儿子在新家茁壮成长，却在哈马斯 10 月 7 日的袭击中失去了儿子。
item.description:
After Yegebal Ayalew immigrated with her son from Ethiopia to Israel in 2012, she watched him thrive in their new home only to lose him in Hamas's October 7 attack.https://t.co/nXzEAthdzn pic.twitter.com/dR9qgfjFuE

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 9, 2024

item.title: 马库斯-史密斯（Marcus Smith）在最后一球中投命中，英格兰队在特威克纳姆（Twickenham）以 23-22 的戏剧性比分结束了六国赛冠军爱尔兰队连续获得大满贯的希望。
item.description:
Marcus Smith's last-ditch drop-goal saw England end Six Nations champions Ireland's hope of successive Grand Slams with a dramatic 23-22 win at Twickenham.https://t.co/EkloTAt009 pic.twitter.com/V0ojjKaAGO

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 9, 2024

item.title: 哈里-凯恩在拜仁慕尼黑 8-1 大胜美因茨的比赛中上演帽子戏法，追平了一项有 60 年历史的纪录，并为球队保留了追赶领头羊拜耳勒沃库森的希望。#AFPSports
item.description:
Harry Kane scored a hat-trick as Bayern Munich thumped Mainz 8-1, equalling a 60-year-old record and keeping alive his team's hopes of catching leaders Bayer Leverkusen. #AFPSportshttps://t.co/bqWIJZsP2K pic.twitter.com/Uqyt9VMLXG

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 9, 2024

item.title: #最新消息 豪尔赫-马丁（Jorge Martin）在周六的卡塔尔冲刺赛中夺冠，获得了新赛季 MotoGP 的首个积分，卫冕双料世界冠军弗朗切斯科-巴尼亚（Francesco Bagnaia）排名第四。#AFPSports
item.description:
#UPDATE Jorge Martin got the first points on the board in the new MotoGP season, winning Saturday's sprint in Qatar with defending double world champion Francesco Bagnaia in fourth. #AFPSportshttps://t.co/UX6RpWVCpX pic.twitter.com/xpWvOkUxoh

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 9, 2024

item.title: #BREAKING England beat Ireland 23-22 in Six Nations rugby.#AFPSports
item.description:
#BREAKING England beat Ireland 23-22 in Six Nations rugby. #AFPSports pic.twitter.com/hhLCvCUJ1S

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 9, 2024

item.title: #爱尔兰总理利奥-瓦拉德卡（Leo Varadkar）表示，关于在宪法中重新定义家庭和妇女角色的双重公投已被否决。
item.description:
#UPDATES A dual referendum in Ireland on redefining family and women's roles in the constitution has been defeated, Prime Minister Leo Varadkar said.https://t.co/zVuYxkYnK1 pic.twitter.com/lsZisVFh34

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 9, 2024

item.title: 一个非政府组织说，在斋月到来之前，以色列军队和哈马斯武装分子之间战火纷飞，一艘满载为饱受战争蹂躏的加沙地带的巴勒斯坦人提供食品的船只准备从塞浦路斯启航。
item.description:
A boat laden with food for Palestinians in war-ravaged Gaza was ready to set sail from Cyprus, an NGO said as fighting raged between Israeli troops and Hamas militants ahead of Ramadan.https://t.co/ev61USII1L pic.twitter.com/qUsLSWwyzi

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 9, 2024

item.title: #哈马斯在斋月期间强化人质协议立场，以 "煽动地区局势"：以色列总理办公室
item.description:
#BREAKING Hamas hardening hostage deal stance to 'inflame region' in Ramadan: Israel PM office pic.twitter.com/H3h6po6HVE

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 9, 2024

item.title: 埃弗顿在老特拉福德球场为上半场的两个点球付出了代价，曼联在周六的比赛中以 2-0 的比分战胜了埃弗顿，重新回到了胜利的轨道上，并保留了下赛季冠军联赛的希望。#AFPSports完整故事：
item.description:
⚽ Everton paid for conceding two first-half penalties at Old Trafford, as Manchester United bounced back to winning ways and keeping their Champions League hopes for next season alive, with a 2-0 victory on Saturday. #AFPSports
Full story: https://t.co/3Snhmp2EHR pic.twitter.com/0GoU18dv9R

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 9, 2024

item.title: 基辅周六表示，俄罗斯对乌克兰赫尔松地区的炮击和袭击造成一人死亡，数人受伤，至少两名平民也在对该国中部和东部的袭击中丧生：
item.description:
Russian shelling and strikes on Ukraine's Kherson region killed one person and wounded several, with at least two civilians also killed in attacks on the centre and east of the country, Kyiv said Saturday.
Read more: https://t.co/O5YAfrzObl pic.twitter.com/sjXT4ZJJcL

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 9, 2024

item.title: #豪尔赫-马丁（Jorge Martin）赢得赛季揭幕战卡塔尔站 MotoGP 冲刺赛冠军#AFPSports
item.description:
#BREAKING Jorge Martin wins season-opening Qatar MotoGP sprint#AFPSports pic.twitter.com/hXSZZaiGAh

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 9, 2024

item.title: #最新消息 意大利队在周六的六国赛主场比赛中以 31-29 的比分击败苏格兰队，赢得了 11 年来的首场胜利，同时也让爱尔兰队有机会在还有一场比赛的情况下赢得冠军。
item.description:
#UPDATE Italy won their first Six Nations home match in 11 years on Saturday, beating Scotland 31-29 and handing Ireland the chance to win the championship with a match to spare.#AFPSports pic.twitter.com/NFXDwzx7JB

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 9, 2024

item.title: #意大利在六国赛中以 31-29 击败苏格兰#AFPSports
item.description:
#BREAKING Italy stun Scotland 31-29 in Six Nations#AFPSports pic.twitter.com/AkWCSqVYTA

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 9, 2024

item.title: #BREAKING Ireland referendum on family and women roles defeated：瓦拉德卡
item.description:
#BREAKING Ireland referendum on family and women's roles defeated: Varadkar pic.twitter.com/SESDEZzqSO

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 9, 2024

item.title: 🏉 法国队将在 1 月 31 日举行的 2025 年六国赛揭幕战中主场迎战威尔士队，而爱尔兰队将对阵英格兰队。#AFPSports
item.description:
🏉 France will host Wales in the 2025 Six Nations opener on January 31, while Ireland kick off against England, tournament organisers said as they unveiled the fixture schedule on Saturday. #AFPSportshttps://t.co/Z6D1wNQy8W pic.twitter.com/9WCElQYXVu

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 9, 2024

item.title: 梵蒂冈周六表示，教皇方济各已接受波兰主教安杰伊-迪乌巴（Andrzej Dziuba）的辞呈。全文如下
item.description:
Pope Francis has accepted the resignation of Polish bishop Andrzej Dziuba, accused of covering up child sexual abuse by at least two paedophile priests in his diocese, the Vatican said on Saturday, the second such decision in as many months.
Full story: https://t.co/8rqVngA4FT pic.twitter.com/ReG7mhw3EB

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 9, 2024

item.title: 英国外交大臣戴维-卡梅伦（David Cameron）周六在接受德国《南德意志报》（Sueddeutsche Zeitung）采访时表示，他反对向乌克兰派遣西方军队，即使是执行训练任务。卡梅伦说，训练任务最好在国外进行。
item.description:
British foreign minister David Cameron said he opposes sending Western troops to Ukraine, even for training missions, in an interview with German daily Sueddeutsche Zeitung published on Saturday. Cameron said training missions are best carried out abroad.https://t.co/lJ5b8vS3Ix pic.twitter.com/hiC033E5P1

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 9, 2024
